pages.title: Level System
pages.text: Your companion gains XP from tasks and levels up to $(bold)Level 30$().$(br2)Each level grants:$(br)$(li)+2 Max Health (1 heart)$(li)+0.5 Attack Damage$(li)+0.005 Movement Speed$(br2)Base stats (Lv.0): 40 HP, 3.0 ATK, 0.35 Speed$(br)Max stats (Lv.30): 100 HP, 18.0 ATK, 0.50 Speed$(br2)Level progress is shown on the HUD overlay.

pages.title: XP Rewards
pages.text: XP is earned from companion activities:$(br2)$(li)$(bold)Task Complete$(): 25 XP$(li)$(bold)Mob Kill$(): 10 XP$(li)$(bold)Deliver Items$(): 15 XP$(li)$(bold)Villager Trade$(): 10 XP$(li)$(bold)Smelt Items$(): 8 XP$(li)$(bold)Craft Item$(): 5 XP$(li)$(bold)Catch Fish$(): 3 XP$(br2)XP formula: Level N requires $(mono)100 × N²$() total XP.$(br)Level 5 = 2,500 XP. Level 10 = 10,000 XP.
